attributes.action: Ask for Bulgaria and Romania, as full members of the European Union to be treated like other East European entrants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dear Prime Minister, It is unfair to impose restrictions on Bulgarian and Romanian EU Citizens seeking work in this country. You claim to support the free movement of people, goods and services in the EU but you have imposed restrictions. Please remove them aand make these two countries equal to the other recent entrants
